name: Infinitely up 3
description:
Description

Infinitely up 3 - this is a physical puzzle, where you have to build a tower higher and higher from randomly issued figures. The difficulty lies in the fact that the figures possess physics and if you incorrectly put the figure and it falls down, then you lose. Some shapes are very versatile and often help, and some only get in the way, so try to be smart about building. How high will you build the tower?

Features:

- Interesting and addictive gameplay

- A variety of shapes

- Pleasant music

- Minimalistic style
